lead_paragraph: On one side, were Mr. Kerry and President Obama. On the other, President-elect Donald J. Trump and Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel, and time is on their side.

headline.main: In John Kerry’s Mideast Speech, a Clash of Policies and Personalities
headline.print_headline: Two-State Plan Nears the End of Its Shelf Life

abstract: New Analysis; Pres-elect Donald J Trump rushes to Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu's defense after Sec of State John Kerry harshly censure Israel in speech intended to salvage two-state solution; many see speech as eulogy for longstanding policy, supported by much of world.
snippet: On one side, were Mr. Kerry and President Obama. On the other, President-elect Donald J. Trump and Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel, and time is on their side....
